name: fantastic fingerless mittens
sizes_available: one size fits most adult females
notes:
**we needed a clean, simple fingerless mitten pattern that would showcase hand-dyed sock-weight yarns, and this awesome pattern is the delightful result! it is fantastic for showing off interesting colourways without any special techniques or stitches to compete with the beauty of an indie dyed yarn. we hope that you enjoy it as much as we do!** 

these mittens use about half a skein of sock weight yarn - perfect for using up your scraps or making matching pairs for friends and fam!

this is a great pattern for peeps who are getting familiar with knitting in the round, or for pros who want a quick and easy knitflix project. 

**this pattern is available for [free on our website][1] - there is also a free downloadable copy there as well!** 

**this pattern was designed by stashy peep veronica!**
check her out on [instagram][2] + [facebook][3].

for pattern support, please email us at questions@stashlounge.com
